Comments_List: I learned about the importance of material culture for historical analysis. This was something that I had previously overlooked, because I did not know how to use it for my own interpretation. I also gained a wealth of knowledge about Jewish history in general.

I would recommend this course! I went into it with very little knowledge about Jewish history, but a decent background in medieval history, and I ended up learning  a lot and thoroughly enjoying it. I would recommend to any history major, or curious students in other majors! Excellent seminar.
